attributes.action: send in our forces to retrieve the 15 Royal Navy Personnell
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a petition for our military personnell who are illegally held to be brought back to the UK through military might whether this is through a covert operation by Special Forces or an all out invasion. Bring back our captured forces!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
